thread.section_title: Protea Hotel by Marriott Entebbe - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Friendly, modern, great service
thread.title_full: Friendly, modern, great service - Review of Protea Hotel by Marriott Entebbe, Entebbe, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Tim P
title: Friendly, modern, great service
text:
This is a modern and very clean hotel located on Lake Victoria. The lobby, Resturant, bar, pool and garden are very well maintained. The views are great. I've stayed there twice and the staff are just fantastic. The food at the Resturant is excellent and there is often a buffet and the regular menu.
The rooms are very modern, appear to be recently remodeled and are exceptionally clean.
The hotel is very convenient to the airport and several restaurants and shops are nearby.
The drive to Kampala is treacherous. Official vehicles often will close part or all of the road. The traffic in Kampala is very heavy. After dealing with traffic to and from Kampala the Protea Entebbe was a very nice place to unwind.
